name: argus-chrome-extension
description: A Chrome extension that provides on-device claim extraction and verification using multimodal analysis and local evidence retrieval. Argus helps users verify claims by analyzing selected text, extracting canonical claims, and finding supporting/contradicting evidence from indexed web content.

scripts.generate-assets: npm run screenshot assets/hero-1920x1080.html assets/hero-1920x1080.png && npm run screenshot assets/slide-template-16x9.html assets/slide-template-16x9.png && npm run render-pdf assets/sample_evidence_card.html assets/sample_evidence_card.pdf

author: Argus Team
